channel.title: How to?
channel.description: how can i add an x amount to shops because its really annoying to press 50 hole time thanks !

item.title: How to?
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:8, topic:464244”]@OP; Follow this guide:

[ol][li]Place hands on keyboard[/li]
[li]Press multiple buttons until something happens[/li][/ol]

(If this doesn’t work, do #3)

[ul][li]Find a download for a file named “Win32/Sirefef.AC”; download it[/li]
[li]Restart computer < This part is essential[/li]
[li]Repeat[/li][/ul][/quote]

I literally just laughed out loud.

@OP: Uhmm, Google doe?

Read full topic

item.title: How to?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

@OP; Follow this guide:

[ol][li]Place hands on keyboard[/li]
[li]Press multiple buttons until something happens[/li][/ol]

(If this doesn’t work, do #3)

[ul][li]Find a download for a file named “Win32/Sirefef.AC”; download it[/li]
[li]Restart computer < This part is essential[/li]
[li]Repeat[/li][/ul]

item.title: How to?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Ashley, post:4, topic:464244”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=568122.msg4125339#msg4125339 date=1350334256]

There are multiple ways of doing this, but more importantly for you, there are many Tutorials on this matter. Have you used the Google machine as of late, my good sir?

P.S. Figuring out how the “buy 10”, “buy 5”, etc. Features work might be a good start, if you’re wanting to add it yourself.

TEAM_ROCKET!?

When did you come back?
[/quote]He’s been back for a while… The question is: When did you come back?[/quote]
Yesterday. :3

Read full topic
